TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder implements class System.Web.UI.ITemplate
Public Class TemplateBuilder Inherits ControlBuilder Implements ITemplate
public ref class TemplateBuilder : System::Web::UI::ControlBuilder, System::Web::UI::ITemplate
type TemplateBuilder = class inherit ControlBuilder interface ITemplate

Docs.summary: Supports the page parser in building a template and the child controls it contains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To use a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder> class for a control, create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> for the control, and then return the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method.

The responsible for building the control.

Docs.param: The to contain the instances of controls from the inline template.
Docs.summary: Defines the object that child controls and templates belong to in design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.InstantiateIn%2A> method is required when implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface. The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.InstantiateIn%2A> method is used only in design time.

Docs.related: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

Docs.summary: Determines if the control builder needs to get its inner text.
Docs.returns: if the control builder needs to get its inner text. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A> method needs to be called when we are in design time. The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A> method returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.InDesigner%2A> property of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class.

Docs.param: The inner text of the template.
Docs.summary: Saves the inner text of the template tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A> method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.Text%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the text between the opening and closing tags of the template.
Docs.value: The text that appears between the opening and closing tags of the template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.Text%2A> property is used by the designer to specify or determine the text that appears between the opening and closing tags of the template.
